tag_to_content.title: VT Technology Ventures
tag_to_content.p_2: VT Technology Ventures is a boutique investment firm, specializing in supporting great ideas which have resulted in great early and growth stage companies.  We believe in sweat equity and support founder teams who have already invested their passion, time and energy to turn their ideas into viable businesses.  We are ready to help them accelerate their growth and take the next step.
tag_to_content.p_3: Our main focus are technology companies, especially ones where we can help with our experience in building and scaling B2B software solutions.
tag_to_content.p_4: Tanya Bakalov is a technology executive, CPA and investor with a keen eye for operations.  She also has a strong sales background having experience with running both direct and low-touch sales organizations.  Tanya started her carrier as an IT and Sarbanes-Oxley Auditor at Deloitte.  While having successfully completed both M&A and financing rounds on the corporate side, her insight into optimizing operations, process and cost provide great value to the startups that she works with.
tag_to_content.p_5: Tanya Bakalov is a technology executive, CPA and investor with a keen eye for operations.  She also has a strong sales background having experience with running both direct and low-touch sales organizations.  Tanya started her carrier as an IT and Sarbanes-Oxley Auditor at Deloitte.  While having successfully completed both M&A and financing rounds on the corporate side, her insight into optimizing operations, process and cost provide great value to the startups that she works with.
tag_to_content.p_6: Vess Bakalov brings 20 years of technology experience and 10 years as executive in one of the fastest growing technology companies in America.  As a founder, executive and investor he has been deeply involved in multiple rounds of financing on both sides of the table.  As a technologist he is an expert in developing high performance distributed horizontally scale-out systems, cloud computing and networking.
tag_to_content.p_7: Vess Bakalov brings 20 years of technology experience and 10 years as executive in one of the fastest growing technology companies in America.  As a founder, executive and investor he has been deeply involved in multiple rounds of financing on both sides of the table.  As a technologist he is an expert in developing high performance distributed horizontally scale-out systems, cloud computing and networking.
tag_to_content.p_8: Our story is simple.  We believe in leading by example.  Our journey has taken us down many of the paths that entrepreneurs face, and we have learned that it is true partnerships which are the only relationships that endure.
